name: .VHDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .VHDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Disk image supported by the Windows 8 and Windows Server 8 operating systems; extends the .VHD format with new capabilities, such as performance improvements, data corruption prevention mechanisms, and a 16TB maximum allowable size.

content: Microsoft Windows Server 8 includes Microsoft Hyper-V technology, which can use disk images to bootstrap virtual machines.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
